name: Coloring Happy Pixels 3D
description:
Do you love antistress coloring books by numbers, don’t you? Oh, everyone loves! So you should try pixel coloring 3D! Voxels is a new addiction for coloring lovers.
HappyPixels 3D is created for everyone. Kids and adults will find interesting coloring pages for them in our voxel game.
- There are a lot of free coloring pages 3D!
- Amazing and bright palettes
- Sharing with friends
- Antistress effect
- Interesting categories like a space, cars, technique
Try it! To be human is to be creative!

Pay attention, some content in this app is available on a subscription basis. Subscriptions are weekly. Payments for such subscriptions would be charged at your account at the confirmation of the purchase. The subscription will automatically renew for the same price and duration period as the original subscription package chosen by you unless you turn off the auto-renew: in case of an Apple App Store, at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period (Apple App Store). You may manage subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to the user's account settings after the purchase. You can cancel the subscription at any time and the cancellation will take effect after the end of the last day of that subscription period. Certain of our subscription services may be offered on a free trial basis for a certain period of time. You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the free trial subscription period (Apple App Store), otherwise, it will be renewed as a paid subscription. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Please, read the terms of use before installing https://2d2b.github.io/privacy/ios.terms.coloring.voxels.html
